## AlCabinet.get() method

Retrieves a property from the cabinet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(property: string, defaultValue?: any, disableExpiration?: boolean): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  property | <code>string</code> | The name of the property. |
|  defaultValue | <code>any</code> | The value to return if the property doesn't exist (defaults to <code>null</code>). |
|  disableExpiration | <code>boolean</code> | Indicates whether or not time-based expiration rules should be honored. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`

The value of the property (or provided default)
